poemsDataJson.list_full: 夜(よ)をこめて 鳥(とり)のそら音(ね)は はかるとも よに逢坂(あふさか)の 関(せき)はゆるさじ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: The rooster's crowing//In the middle of the night//Deceived the hearers;//But at Osaka's gateway//The guards are never fooled.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Yo o komete|Tori no sorane wa|Hakaru tomo|Yoni Ōsaka no|Seki wa yurusaji
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: よにあふさかの せきはゆるさし
poemsDataJson.author: 清少納言(せいしょうなごん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 夜深いうちに帰った男に対し、やり返す心
